main event: A civilian observed a bright, reflective object in the sky for 5 minutes on March 17, 1954.
interesting points: The object exhibited slow movements and erratic behavior, hovering and swiftly moving back and forth,The object was reported to be circular and shiny,The observation was made by a 33-year-old teacher,The sighting occurred approximately four miles southeast of Long Beach Air Force Base,The report concluded that there was insufficient data for evaluation.
